name: eShelf
description:
At eShelf, we help you get the things you want, faster than ever before.
We show you products available in nearby stores in real-time, wherever you are. Don’t waste time walking around, or waiting for deliveries. Simply purchase your item on our platform and it will be reserved for you. Then, collect it yourself or book a same-day delivery.
When you absolutely have to get the item you want right now, simply visit eShelf.

jobs.title: MARKETING IN STARTUP PROGRAM
jobs.description:
The program has the goal to let students that are currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program in London to experience the startup life with hand-on experience. The program will run from October 2019-March 2020, based at Imperial Enterprise Lab. The hours are flexible based on the candidate’s university schedule. A manager would be assigned to the successful candidate, learning meetings will run monthly to review the performances and guide you on your learning journey.

As a Student in Start-up, you will be exposed to the early stage and the secret sauce of a London tech start-up. You will learn by doing how to run the marketing operations and how to let the magic happen for our users. You will be involved in gather users’ feedback and from ideation to execution of the new eShelf’s website.

eShelf is the #1 E-commerce that helps people to get the products they need very fast, helping local businesses and having a low carbon footprint. Showing the distance of items available in real-time across different stores nearby and allow to buy seamlessly.
Our vision is to “change the way you shop” merging the online and offline channels of retails and saving time to shoppers. This is an exciting moment to join eShelf because our e-commerce has been launched a few months ago and we are partnering with new stores every week and people have started to purchase on the platform. We are also working to release soon the second version of eShelf platform with new cool features and a big party.


What you will do: 

- Copywriting: Supporting the Marketing Manager with the communication strategy across social media. Translating the strategy of eShelf into weekly posts being in charge to write them and from time to time short articles. Responsible to maintain the posting calendar and posting into across the different channels. 

- Pay Marketing: Exposure to support with Facebook advertising, Instagram advertising, and Google AdWords. 

- Marketing Growth Hacking: We are going to experiment a lot during the next months and you are going to be in front of this together with Co-founders. Our approach is to run quickly inexpensive experiments that can generate traffic and transactions and invest in the most promising.

- Off-line marketing: Helping with the customer's interviews for getting feedback about the marketing strategy. Off-line promotions and creative thinking. 

- Event Managing: Being in charge of helping with the event organization, that will see shops owners and users as the main audience. 

Who we are looking for:

- Plus if Native English speaker. 
-  pursuing a B.A. in Marketing, Advertising, Business, Creative Writing, English, Journalism, or Communications or equivalent course in your country, business, marketing. 
- A love of creative content and exciting about experimental marketing.
- Buckets of ambition, a passion for your craft and plenty of hustle. 
- Research on the market, able to understand the trends 
- Proactive and able to take ownership of the assigned tasks 
- Experience with pictures, video editing is a plus.

Who we are looking for:
•	Desire to gain first-hand graphic design, UX and UI experience
•	Growth mindset, can-do attitude
•	Studying towards a bachelor’s or master’s degree in Graphic/Design or Visual Art would be ideal but other courses will also be considered
•	Strong graphics skills; highly motivated and intellectually curious 
•	Proactive and able to take ownership of the assigned tasks

jobs.title: Co-Founder & Marketing Expert
jobs.description:
eShelf is a marketplace that connects independent boutiques and people that are looking for amazing products.  
Our vision is to become “the marketplace for independent stores”  helping them to merge the online and offline channels seamlessly and saving time to shoppers. 
This is an exciting moment to join eShelf because our platform is fully functioning with stores that are joining every month. Join us to reshape the retail industry during and after the Lockdown. We can save so many independent shops and support!
 
Who we are looking for:
-More than 3 years experience with Digital Marketing: PPC, social media marketing, content marketing, SEO, email marketing 
-Experience with 2 side platform or e-commerce  in a startup 
-Copywriting and PR experience is a plus
-Passionate for homeware, fashion and amazing decor products
- Buckets of ambition, passion for digital marketing

Contact email: 
PLEASE NOTE: this is a part time position for which we will be looking to give an equity share 5-15% based on experience. This is not a salaried role.
